system.description:
You mix some inherent psionic power with the supernatural power granted by a higher, divine being such as a god. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Wisdom score or your Intelligence score increases by +1, to a maximum of 20.
  • While you have Psychic Focus active, you may roll a die equal to one of your psionic dice and add the result to the hit points healed by spells of the Healing school you cast.
  • Half your Cleric levels count as Esper levels for the purpose of gaining access to the Psychometry feature.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in Cleric, 3 levels in Esper
